info.description:
APIs to cater for Rate Availability functionality in OPERA Cloud.

Rate Management provides all the tools you need to effectively define and manage the rate structures for a property in OPERA Cloud. Some of the things you can do include creating and managing rate codes, rate classes, rate categories, display sets, rate strategies, as well as managing promotion groups and codes.

Compatible with OPERA Cloud release 23.2.

This document and all content within is available under the Universal Permissive License v 1.0 (https://oss.oracle.com/licenses/upl). Copyright (c) 2020, 2024 Oracle and/or its affiliates.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

limit.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

offset.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

totalPages.description: Evaluated total page count based on the requested max fetch count.

iPAddress.description: The IP Address of the machine that performed the activity

addtionalCodeInfoType.description: Holds name of additional code information

name.description: Holds name of additional code information

value.description: Holds value of additional code information

adjustmentCategoryType.description: Simple type for Yield Adjustment types.

adjustmentDetailType.description: The adjustment code details for the rate schedule.

adjustmentCode.description: the adjustment code that needs to be attached to the rate schedule.

deleteAdjustment.description: Should this Adjustment code be deleted ?

overriddenAmount.description: The amount with which the actual adjustment will be overridden. if no amount is sent, default adjustment code's amount will be used.

advancedBaseRateOffsetType.description: A Rate which is of Advanced Dynamic Base Rate can have rate schedule based on an offset from its Base Rate or BAR Rate.

applyBar.description: Should this schedule be Advanced dynamically based on BAR rate.

flatOrPercentage.description: It signifies offset amount is of Flat or Percentage type. Valid Values are F/P.

offset.description: offset amount for the advanced dynamic base rate schedule.

advancedDependentRatePlans.description: Advanced Dependent Rate plan code(s) for the rate plan.It is the list of rate plans that are Advanced Dynamically based on the Rate Plan.

basedOnRatePlan.description: Rate plan code used to Advanced Dynamically base the rate on.

compareWithRateSchedules.description: While showing availability, do system need to compare the static rates defined for the rate with Advanced dynamically computed base rate pricing? If true, availability shows lower of the these two pricing. If false, availability shows the advanced dynamically calculated pricing.

rounding.description: Rounding style used for the calculated rate amounts. Valid values are U,D,N,C,F which means Up, Down, None, Up-Keep Decimal, Down - Keep Decimal.

amountDeterminationType.description: Used to indicate if an amount is inclusive or exclusive of other charges, such as taxes.

hotelId.description: Hotel code to which the article belongs.

inactive.description: Indicates whether the article is inactive or not.

postIt.description: Post it information of the article.

transactionCode.description: Transaction code to which the article belongs.

universalProductCode.description: Unique Universal product code of the article.

articlePostItType.description: Post it information of an article.

availableForPostIt.description: Indicates whether the article is available for post it.

color.description: Color indicator which is only configurable if article is available for post it.

authorizerUserName.description: Application user name of the authorizer

inheritAuthorizerRateCode.description: Indicates whether user has the choice to have reservation inherit rate code from the authorizer.

adjustmentDetails.description: The adjustment code details for the rate plan schedule.

advancedBaseRateOffset.description: Rate plan schedule based on an offset from its Base Rate or BAR Rate.

end.description: The ending value of the date range.

occupantThresholdPricing.description: Occupant threshold pricing for the rate plan schedule including adult thresholds, child thresholds, and occupant thresholds.

rateAmountBoundaries.description: Rate amount boundaries for the rate plan schedule. Includes the minimum and/or maximum rate amounts for one and/or two adults.

rateAmounts.description: Rate amounts for the rate plan schedule.

rateSchedulePackages.description: List of packages attached to the rate plan schedule.

seasonCode.description: Season code attached to the rate plan schedule that defines the start and end dates. When creating a rate plan schedule, if a season code is provided the start and end dates will be ignored. These values will be pulled from the season code record.

start.description: The starting value of the date range.

tierID.description: Tier that the rate plan schedule belongs to.

baseType.description: Simple type for base type, flat or differential.

basedOnRatePlanType.description: None means that rate is a standard rate. If sent in the changeRatePlan operation will delete any Based on Rate Plan Type.

bestAvailableRateType.description: The list of best availabe rates for rates code(s).

lengthOfStay.description: Best available rate length of stay

rateCode.description: Rate Code selected to be search.

bestAvailableRatesListType.description: The list of best availabe rates for rate code(s)

bestAvailableRates.description: Collection of best available rates for rate code(s)

hotelId.description: Hotel code for which best available rates will be considered.

masterInfoList.description: The list of references of rate code selected as best available rates

bestAvailableRatesType.description: The best available rate for rate code(s)

dateRange.description: Date range for the best available rates.

duration.description: Days for which best available rates will be considered

hotelId.description: Hotel Code for Best Available Rate

lengthOfStay.description: Length of Stay for which best available rates will be considered

rateCode.description: Rate Code selected to be search.

billingInstructionType.description: Configured Billing Instruction which represents a set of Transaction Codes.

billingCode.description: Unique identifier for the Billing Instruction.

hotelId.description: Hotel context of the Billing Instruction.

routingInstructionsId.description: This is the Routing Instruction Id attached with Reservation. It is only used for internal purpose. It should not be used by external vendor or consumer.

blockRatePlanType.description: The block rate plan code information.

endSellDate.description: End sell date of the rate code.

marketCode.description: Market code associated with the rate code.

negotiated.description: True if the rate plan code, is a negotiated code otherwise false.

showRateAmount.description: True if the rate amount for the rate plan code will be visible, otherwise false.

sourceCode.description: Source code associated with the rate code.

startSellDate.description: Start sell date of the rate code.

blockRatePlans.description: Response object to fetch rate plans summary information for blocks.
Description of rate codes for the block and their information.

blockRatePlansType.description: Description of rate codes for the block and their information.

codeDescriptionType.description: This contains a generic code and description information.

codeType.description: Used for codes in the OPERA Code tables. Possible values of this pattern are 1, 101, 101.EQP, or 101.EQP.X.

colorType.description: Color configuration type. This color configuration provides a visual category of entities.

beginSellDate.description: Indicates the begin sell date of the package.

endSellDate.description: Indicates the end sell date of the package.

forecastGroup.description: The Forecast group package belongs to.

shortDescription.description: The short description of the package.

end.description: The ending value of the date range.

maxNights.description: Maximum number of nights that are required on a reservation to avail the package.

maxPersons.description: Maximum number of persons that are required on a reservation to avail the package.

minNights.description: Minimum number of nights that are required on a reservation to avail the package.

minPersons.description: Minimum number of persons that are required on a reservation to avail the package.

newMaxNights.description: New maximum number of nights that are required on a reservation to avail the package.

newMaxPersons.description: New maximum number of persons that are required on a reservation to avail the package.

newMinNights.description: New minimum number of nights that are required on a reservation to avail the package.

newMinPersons.description: New minimum number of persons that are required on a reservation to avail the package.

newTimeSpan.description: The new time span for package price.

ratePlanCode.description: The rate plan code specific prices for the package (if any).

schedulePrices.description: Collection of price schedule for the package.

start.description: The starting value of the date range.

allowance.description: Package is marked as an allowance, in case charge is expected back to the guest account from external interface eg. POS. which need to be offset against a consumption allowance.

calculationRule.description: The price calculation rule for this package.

currency.description: The currency code for this package.

postingType.description: The posting frequency for this package, e.g., daily, arrival, departure, etc.

configPackageUsageDetailType.description: A Config Package Usage Detail type.

source.description: Indicates if the source of the product is Rate header, Rate Detail or Reservation.

usedInHouseReservations.description: Indicates if any checked in reservations are using this product.

usedInRates.description: Indicates if the package is used in any rate code.

usedInReservations.description: Indicates if the package is used in, reserved or prospect reservations.

configPostingAttributesType.description: A config Package posting attributes type.

addToRate.description: The package price is added to the room rate.

calculatedPrice.description: Calculated Package Price based from Number of Adults, Children and Calculation Rule.

deliveryTimeRequired.description: Indicates whether a delivery time is required for the package.

endTime.description: End time the package is valid.

forecastNextDay.description: Package will be forecasted for consumption the next business day.

formula.description: The custom formula used for this package, if any.

formulaFunctionArguments.description: The function argument name-value combination accepted by the custom formula used for this package.

formulaFunctionName.description: The custom formula function name used for this package, if any.

postNextDay.description: package charges will be posted next business day.

postingRhythm.description: The posting rhythm for this package.

priceCalculationRule.description: The price calculation rule for this package.

printSeparateLine.description: The package price is printed on separate line of the folio.

sellSeparate.description: Can the package be sold separate from rate plan code?

startTime.description: Start time the package is valid.

ticket.description: Indicates whether a package is configured as a ticket or not.

webBookable.description: Can package be sold via Web channel.

copyPackageCodeInfoType.description: The type gives details of the source package code to be copied along with information of the target where the package code is being copied. Details include source package code to be copied, the hotel code where the package code will be copied to, the name and description with which the package code will be copied under the target hotel code.

copyAs.description: The code and description to be used for the package code being copied under the target hotel code.

sourcePackageCode.description: Source package code to be copied.

targetHotelCode.description: Target hotel code where the package code will be copied to.

customNightSchedule.description: The start and end of the posting period is determined as follows: If the package is attached to a rate code: The period starts with the date when the rate code to which the package is attached becomes effective for the stay. The period ends with the date of the last night for that rate code (or the last night of the stay if the rate code remains in effect until the departure date). If the package is attached separately to the reservation: The Begin Date specified on the reservation when the package was attached is the start date for the period. The End Date specified on the reservation when the package was attached is the end date for the period. If no Begin Date and/or End Date are specified when the package is attached to the reservation, the Begin Date is assumed to be the arrival date and the End Date is assumed to be the departure date of the reservation, irrespective of when the package is attached to the reservation.
